<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ui_action"><sys_ui_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><action_name>Copy to KPI</action_name><active>true</active><client>false</client><comments/><condition/><form_action>true</form_action><form_button>false</form_button><form_context_menu>false</form_context_menu><form_link>true</form_link><hint>Uset this link to move your threshold into a KPI trigger.</hint><list_action>false</list_action><list_banner_button>false</list_banner_button><list_button>false</list_button><list_choice>false</list_choice><list_context_menu>false</list_context_menu><list_link>false</list_link><list_save_with_form_button>false</list_save_with_form_button><name>Copy to KPI</name><onclick/><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var kpi = new GlideRecord('u_kpi');
	kpi.initialize();
	
	current.indicator = kpi.u_indicator;
	current.breakdown = kpi.u_breakdown;
	current.time_series = kpi.u_time_series;
	
	kpi.insert();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><show_insert>true</show_insert><show_multiple_update>false</show_multiple_update><show_query>false</show_query><show_update>true</show_update><sys_class_name>sys_ui_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-26 21:49:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>eb260483db2312009c99fbefbf961968</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy to KPI</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_action_eb260483db2312009c99fbefbf961968</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-26 21:49:15</sys_updated_on><table/><ui11_compatible>true</ui11_compatible><ui16_compatible>false</ui16_compatible></sys_ui_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_d7791926db2312009c99fbefbf961960
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>get_kpis</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(request) {

	/**
	 * Declare the variables for our API.  If the request query parameter
	 * sysparm_search_value is empty or null, set it to an empty string.
	 */
	var searchParameter = request.queryParams.sysparm_search_value || '';
	var records = [];
	var dashboard = {};

	/**
	 * Initialize a new GlideRecord on the Incident table.  Order by priority,
	 * and ensure that we are retrieving records that does not currently have an
	 * assignee.  If the search parameter is not empty, add a query to look for
	 * records that contain the search term in the short_description.
	 */
	var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	gr.orderBy('priority');
	gr.addQuery('priority', 1);
	gr.addQuery('active', false);
	//gr.addNullQuery('assigned_to');
	if (searchParameter != '')
		gr.addQuery('short_description', 'CONTAINS', searchParameter);
	gr.query();

	/**
	 * Push a record object to our array.  If the dashboard object does not have 
	 * a priority key, add the key, create an object that contains the count and
	 * value.  If the dashboard object does have a key, increment the count.
	 */
	while (gr.next()) {
		records.push({
			sys_id: gr.getUniqueValue(), 
			number: gr.getValue('number'), 
			short_description: gr.getValue('short_description')
		});

		if (!dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')])
			dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')] = {count:1, value: gr.getValue('priority')};
		else
			dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')].count += 1;
	}

	/**
	 * Return our response.
	 */
	return {
		records: records, 
		dashboard: dashboard, 
		total: gr.getRowCount()
	};

})(request);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_20227_kpi_manage/kpi_manager</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-25 14:16:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d7791926db2312009c99fbefbf961960</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>get_kpis</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_d7791926db2312009c99fbefbf961960</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-01 00:18:57</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="KPI Manager">0b3911a2db2312009c99fbefbf96190c</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_30c755e2db2312009c99fbefbf96190a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_manager_model</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('kpi_manager.app').service('KpiManagerModel', function($http){
	
	"use strict";
	
	this.initialize = function() {
		//end point Uknown at this point 
		this.endpoint = '/api/x_20227_kpi_manage/kpi_manager';
		this.searchValue = '';
		this.data = {records: [], dashboard: {}, total: 0};
		this.getListData();
		return this;
	};
	this.removeSearch = function() {
		this.searchValue = '';
		this.getListData();
	};
	
	this.getListData = function() {
		var _this = this;
		$http.get(_this.endpoint + '?sysparm_search_value=' + _this.searchValue).then(function(response) {
			if (!response.data.result)
				return;
			_this.data.records = response.data.result.records;
			_this.data.dashboard = response.data.result.dashboard;
			_this.data.total = response.data.result.total;
				});
	};
});	
		
]]></script><script_name>kpi_manager_model</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-25 14:08:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>30c755e2db2312009c99fbefbf96190a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_manager_model</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_30c755e2db2312009c99fbefbf96190a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-31 21:46:27</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_manager_ctrl</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('kpi_manager.app').controller('KpiManagerCtrl', ['$scope', 'KpiManagerModel', 
	'TemplateService','KpiBreachModel', 'KpiActiveBreachModel', function($scope, KpiManagerModel, TemplateService,KpiBreachModel, KpiActiveBreachModel) {
	
	"use strict";
	
	$scope.model = KpiManagerModel.initialize();
	
	$scope.modelBreach = KpiBreachModel.initialize();
		
	$scope.modelActiveBreach = KpiActiveBreachModel.initialize();
		
	$scope.getTemplate = function(name) {
		return TemplateService.getTemplate(name);
	};

	$scope.openIncident = function(sysId) {
		var modal = new GlideModalForm('KPI Manager', 'incident');
		modal.addParm('sysparm_view', 'KPI Manager');
		modal.setSysID(sysId);
		modal.render();
	};

	$scope.$watch('model.searchValue', function(newValue, oldValue) {
		if (newValue !== oldValue)
			$scope.model.getListData();
	});
}]);


]]></script><script_name>kpi_manager_ctrl</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-25 14:06:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>04e615a2db2312009c99fbefbf961934</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_manager_ctrl</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_04e615a2db2312009c99fbefbf961934</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-01 00:13:37</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_10b1f128dbb312009c99fbefbf961946
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_breach_model</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('kpi_manager.app').service('KpiBreachModel', function($http){
	
	"use strict";
	
	this.initialize = function() {
		//end point Uknown at this point 
		this.endpoint = '/api/x_20227_kpi_manage/kpi_manager_breach';
		this.searchValue = '';
		this.data = {records: [], dashboard: {}, total: 0};
		this.getListData();
		return this;
	};
	this.removeSearch = function() {
		this.searchValue = '';
		this.getListData();
	};
	
	this.getListData = function() {
		var _this = this;
		$http.get(_this.endpoint + '?sysparm_search_value=' + _this.searchValue).then(function(response) {
			if (!response.data.result)
				return;
			_this.data.records = response.data.result.records;
			_this.data.dashboard = response.data.result.dashboard;
			_this.data.total = response.data.result.total;
				});
	};
});	]]></script><script_name>kpi_breach_model</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-31 21:15:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>10b1f128dbb312009c99fbefbf961946</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_breach_model</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_10b1f128dbb312009c99fbefbf961946</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-31 21:46:22</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_a2871922db2312009c99fbefbf961931
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_20227_kpi_manage.doughnut_chart</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('kpi_manager.app').directive('snDoughnutChart', function() {

	"use strict";
	
	return {
		restrict: 'E',
		template: '<canvas width="400" height="300"/>',
		replace: true,
		scope: {total: '=', data: '='},
		link: function(scope, element) {
			Chart.defaults.global.legend.position = 'bottom';
			Chart.defaults.global.legend.labels.boxWidth = 10;
			var colors = {1:'tomato', 2:'orange', 3:'#ffca1f', 4:'#4bd762', 5:'#278ecf'};
			var chart = new Chart(element[0], {type: 'doughnut', data: _getChartData()});
			
			scope.$watch('total', function(o, n) {
				chart.config.data = _getChartData();
				chart.update();
			});
			
			function _getChartData() {
				var labels = [], data = [], backgroundColor = [], label;
				for (label in scope.data) {
					labels.push(label);
					data.push(scope.data[label].count);
					if (colors[scope.data[label].value])
						backgroundColor.push(colors[scope.data[label].value]);
				}
				return {labels: labels, datasets: [{data: data, backgroundColor: backgroundColor}]};
			}
		}
	};
});]]></script><script_name>doughnut_chart</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-25 14:08:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a2871922db2312009c99fbefbf961931</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_20227_kpi_manage.doughnut_chart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_a2871922db2312009c99fbefbf961931</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-25 14:08:04</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_4c0886ecdbb312009c99fbefbf96198c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>get_breaches_active</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(request) {

	/**
	 * Declare the variables for our API.  If the request query parameter
	 * sysparm_search_value is empty or null, set it to an empty string.
	 */
	var searchParameter = request.queryParams.sysparm_search_value || '';
	var records = [];
	var dashboard = {};

	/**
	 * Initialize a new GlideRecord on the Incident table.  Order by priority,
	 * and ensure that we are retrieving records that does not currently have an
	 * assignee.  If the search parameter is not empty, add a query to look for
	 * records that contain the search term in the short_description.
	 */
	var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	//gr.orderBy('u_priority');
	gr.addQuery('active',false);
	//gr.addNullQuery('assigned_to');
	if (searchParameter != '')
		gr.addQuery('short_description', 'CONTAINS', searchParameter);
	gr.query();

	/**
	 * Push a record object to our array.  If the dashboard object does not have 
	 * a priority key, add the key, create an object that contains the count and
	 * value.  If the dashboard object does have a key, increment the count.
	 */
	while (gr.next()) {
		records.push({
			sys_id: gr.getUniqueValue(), 
			number: gr.getValue('number'), 
			short_description: gr.getValue('short_description')
		});

		if (!dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')])
			dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')] = {count:1, value: gr.getValue('priority')};
		else
			dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')].count += 1;
	}

	/**
	 * Return our response.
	 */
	return {
		records: records, 
		dashboard: dashboard, 
		total: gr.getRowCount()
	};

})(request);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_20227_kpi_manage/kpi_manager_active_breaches</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-31 22:48:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4c0886ecdbb312009c99fbefbf96198c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>get_breaches_active</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4c0886ecdbb312009c99fbefbf96198c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-31 23:11:15</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="KPI Manager Active Breaches">69d70eecdbb312009c99fbefbf9619ff</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>pa_thresholds</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Copy to KPi</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var kpi = new GlideRecord('u_kpi');
	kpi.initialize();
	
	current.indicator = kpi.u_indicator;
	current.breakdown = kpi.u_breakdown;
	current.time_series = u_time_series;
	
	kpi.insert();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-25 21:24:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6fdafa66dba312009c99fbefbf9619a3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy to KPi</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6fdafa66dba312009c99fbefbf9619a3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-25 21:24:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6fdafa66dba312009c99fbefbf9619a3"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_manager_active_br</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('kpi_manager.app').service('KpiActiveBreachModel', function($http){
	
	"use strict";
	
	this.initialize = function() {
		//end point Uknown at this point 
		this.endpoint = '/api/x_20227_kpi_manage/kpi_manager_active_breaches';
		this.searchValue = '';
		this.data = {records: [], dashboard: {}, total: 0};
		this.getListData();
		return this;
	};
	this.removeSearch = function() {
		this.searchValue = '';
		this.getListData();
	};
	
	this.getListData = function() {
		var _this = this;
		$http.get(_this.endpoint + '?sysparm_search_value=' + _this.searchValue).then(function(response) {
			if (!response.data.result)
				return;
			_this.data.records = response.data.result.records;
			_this.data.dashboard = response.data.result.dashboard;
			_this.data.total = response.data.result.total;
				});
	};
});	
]]></script><script_name>kpi_manager_active_breach</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-31 22:51:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b7b84220dbf312009c99fbefbf9619a9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_20227_kpi_manage.kpi_manager_active_br</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_b7b84220dbf312009c99fbefbf9619a9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-31 22:51:01</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_82a5ad24dbb312009c99fbefbf961965
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>get_breaches</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(request) {

	/**
	 * Declare the variables for our API.  If the request query parameter
	 * sysparm_search_value is empty or null, set it to an empty string.
	 */
	var searchParameter = request.queryParams.sysparm_search_value || '';
	var records = [];
	var dashboard = {};

	/**
	 * Initialize a new GlideRecord on the Incident table.  Order by priority,
	 * and ensure that we are retrieving records that does not currently have an
	 * assignee.  If the search parameter is not empty, add a query to look for
	 * records that contain the search term in the short_description.
	 */
	var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	//gr.orderBy('u_priority');
	gr.addEncodedQuery('sys_created_onONThis week@javascript:gs.beginningOfThisWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfThisWeek()');
	gr.addNullQuery('assigned_to');
	if (searchParameter != '')
		gr.addQuery('short_description', 'CONTAINS', searchParameter);
	gr.query();

	/**
	 * Push a record object to our array.  If the dashboard object does not have 
	 * a priority key, add the key, create an object that contains the count and
	 * value.  If the dashboard object does have a key, increment the count.
	 */
	while (gr.next()) {
		records.push({
			sys_id: gr.getUniqueValue(), 
			number: gr.getValue('number'), 
			short_description: gr.getValue('short_description')
		});

		if (!dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')])
			dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')] = {count:1, value: gr.getValue('priority')};
		else
			dashboard[gr.getDisplayValue('priority')].count += 1;
	}

	/**
	 * Return our response.
	 */
	return {
		records: records, 
		dashboard: dashboard, 
		total: gr.getRowCount()
	};

})(request);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_20227_kpi_manage/kpi_manager_breach</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-31 20:21:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>82a5ad24dbb312009c99fbefbf961965</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>get_breaches</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KPI Management" source="x_20227_kpi_manage">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="KPI Management">a1a611a2db2312009c99fbefbf961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_82a5ad24dbb312009c99fbefbf961965</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-31 22:45:42</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="KPI Manager Breach">2d85e524dbb312009c99fbefbf9619b7</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
